thread.title: Virginia Regulators Approve 80 MW Amazon Solar Farm
thread.title_full: Virginia Regulators Approve 80 MW Amazon Solar Farm

title: Virginia Regulators Approve 80 MW Amazon Solar Farm
text:
28 Virginia Regulators Approve 80 MW Amazon Solar Farm 
Renewable Energy World: Gov. Terry McAuliffe on Sept. 28 announced that the Virginia Department of Environmental Quality plans to issue a permit for an 80 MW solar facility in northern Accomack County, Va.
